name: BecomeMe
description:
Fight Against Monsters!

The story takes place in a remote medieval village. The player will play the role of Maria, whose husband has joined the army to fight against the monsters.

This is a game with rich storyline and battle scenes.

Controls

Move with "WASD"

Continue with the conversation with "ENTER"

Attack with "Left Click"

Jump with "SPACE"

Features

A story-telling RPG game with thrilling battle system against monsters

You can also resume game if you die

This is a student project for INFSCI2935 at the University of Pittsburgh
